Section CARDINAL of the Social Courts Act exempts applicants from the requirement to await the outcome of the preliminary administrative proceedings and allows them to lodge a court action directly with ORG if the administrative authorities fail without sufficient justification to decide the administrative appeal within a reasonable time , in general DATE .

CARDINAL . Section CARDINAL of FAC provides that the insured person may request a further expert report .
